name: ringing
content:
ringing adjective
(LOUD)
Add to word list
Add to word list
A ringing sound is loud and clear. : The soloist began to sing in a beautiful ringing voice that pierced the silence. The ringing cheers of her fans seemed to linger long after the show had ended.
More examplesFewer examplesRinging shouts and cries filled the air as panic spread through the crowd.The ringing tones of electric guitars caused a sensation when they first arrived on the music scene.
